entries.name: Special
entries: This black steel shortsword can be separated in half at the hilt to form two weapons: a shortsword and a dagger. When thrown, the half-blade transforms into a +1 dagger until it is reattached to the hilt, at which point it reverts back to its original form.

Additionally, when you use the Shadowstrike to take the Attack action, you can use a bonus action to cast the spell {@spell Teleport} without expending a spell slot. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you complete a short or long rest.
